resources.string: Hello,Welcome to the Sort My Number! We Will help you sort your numbers using insertion sort.Insertion sort is a simple sorting algorithm that works similar to the way you sort playing cards in your hands. The array is virtually split into a sorted and an unsorted part. Values from the unsorted part are picked and placed at the correct position in the sorted part which has the time complexity of O(n^2).(source:Wikipedia)
